name: Shining Raichu
author: Hironobu Yoshida
flavor_text: If the electricity in its cheeks runs out, it sticks its tail straight up and uses it to collect energy from the air.

attacks.name: Thundersquall
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon for each {W} Energy attached to Shining Raichu. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Shining Raichu in your deck.
